Name: Case 02: Paranormal Evil
About the game: A survival horror puzzle RPG. Roll your dice to perform checks for elements such as Willpower or Firepower, and save a girl in a hospital full of evil spirits and zombies. This work and Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator were co-developed by Sounding Stone and MaouCat Studio. These two games share similar gameplay elements but have completely different worlds and stories. / Features Dice × Survival Horror × Puzzles Roll a Willpower, Firepower, or Dexterity check to exorcise an evil spirit, fire at a zombie or avoid danger. Buy weapons to increase the number of dice you can roll — but be aware that your funds are limited. Strategic Luck Point System By paying Luck Points (LP), you can increase the value of your dice rolls. LP are limited. Use them wisely! Characters 'You' (default name: Marty) A patient who woke up from a coma. You have lost your memory along with all of your family and your only friend. Sarah 'Sally' Sweet An inpatient in the same hospital as you. She has a very sweet voice. Bruce 'Brucie' Lyne A member of the exorcist duo Ghosteaters. He follows his own principles. Jadrienne 'Jade' Lee A member of the Ghosteaters. She is in charge of scouting and support. Lucia 'Lucy' White The client of the Ghosteaters. She values her friends very much.
Developers: Sounding Stone / 老奉毊,MaouCat Studio / 魔王貓工作室
Publishers: Sounding Stone / 老奉毊,RMAsia,Light of Creators
